name: The Forlorn House
description:
Note:  In the web version, the creature's audio is a bit buggy.  I recommend playing the downloadable version if you're able to.

You are stuck in a house with a creature.  You must collect keys around the house to unlock different rooms and, eventually, escape.  Your sanity goes down if your flashlight is off.  You can restore your sanity by standing under a light.  You can turn on lights by interacting with nearby light switches.  However, the creature is alerted when you switch and leave on a light.  Note, you must hold the correct key while interacting with a locked door to unlock it.

Controls:

wasd - move

mouse - look around

right click - toggle flashlight

e - interact with doors or switch, and collect items.

1-9 or the scroll wheel - cycle through your items

Note:  The title screen has a secret if you wait after beating the game, good luck.

Credits:

Made By pikachurian, MC_Creeper, and Kirbybowwow, for the 49 Ludum Dare game jam.  Everything was made for the jam, except some image textures, and a rain sound effect.

Game Jam Entry Link:     https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/$263277
